definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: Those people are always awkward in society.
sentences.chinese: 這些人在社交界總是很尷尬。

sentences.english: Speaking French and playing the piano are social graces.
sentences.chinese: 講法語和彈鋼琴是社交界的兩大風雅。
榆樹大街橡樹大街交界處聚衆鬥毆。

sentences.english: A traffic accident happened at the junction of the King's Road and Kam Hong Street last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚在東風路和建設街交界處有一起交通事故發生。

sentences.english: He lives on the corner of Cedar Street and Lakeview Drive.
sentences.chinese: 他住在柏樹街及湖景車道的交界處。

sentences.english: It's located in Tennessee and North Carolina.
sentences.chinese: 大煙山國家公園位於田納西州和北卡羅來納州交界處。

sentences.english: The engine-feed system interface is at the turbopump inlet flanges .
sentences.chinese: 發動機與供應系統的交界是在渦輪泵的進口法蘭盤處。

sentences.english: Sicily is Europe, Africa and Asia on one island.
sentences.chinese: 西西里島處在一個歐洲，非洲和亞洲交界處。

sentences.english: Alterations occur at the interface between white blood calls and endothelium.
sentences.chinese: 白細胞和內膜的交界面發生改變。

sentences.english: Research the timber-arch bridges discovered in the mountain area where Fujian meets Zhejiang recently.
sentences.chinese: 研究新近在閩浙交界山區發現的木拱虹橋。

sentences.english: The debutante's photograph was at the head of the society page.
sentences.chinese: 那位初進社交界的少女的照片登在社會版的頭條。

sentences.english: This valedictory dispatch was written as he retired from the foreign service a few weeks ago.
sentences.chinese: 這份告別報告是他幾周前從外交界退休時所寫的。

sentences.english: The wedding was attended by the cream of New York society.
sentences.chinese: 參加婚禮的有紐約社交界的精英。

sentences.english: Can't you realize how that distinguished you in your Foreign Service?
sentences.chinese: 難道你不明白這件事使你在外交界多出名？

sentences.english: These are the boundaries around the people of Judah by their clans.
sentences.chinese: 這是猶大人按着宗族所得之地四圍的交界。

sentences.english: We arent connected by land, and we have the greatest navy in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我們兩國陸地不交界，並且我們有天下上最好的水師。

definition: to be located at/to be situated in
to flow together/confluence (of rivers, airflow, roads)/(international) cooperation
to be located at/to be situated at/to lie
